Minimum:
  • OS: Vista
  • Processor: i5-4430 performance class
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 performance class
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 170 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Memory requirement is as needed by the game itself at default settings, estimated maximum frame rate @ 1920x1080 and default settings: 37 (limited by CPU, different settings relieve or tax mostly the GPU). Estimation is based on flying above landscape facing it and sky each around 50% and facing away from the central big tree, using timings at disposal during development-time. Given either required systems class hardware and not running additional software competing for the same resources at the same time for any non-nothing-like duration the experience has been smooth (as in no noticed frame rate fluctuation).

  • Additional Notes: Memory requirement is as needed by the game itself at default settings, estimated maximum frame rate @ 1920x1080 and default settings: 65 (limited by CPU, different settings relieve or tax mostly the GPU). Estimation is based on flying above landscape facing it and sky each around 50% and facing away from the central big tree, using timings at disposal during development-time. Given either required systems class hardware and not running additional software competing for the same resources at the same time for any non-nothing-like duration the experience has been smooth (as in no noticed frame rate fluctuation).
